mods.note: Library has: 1940; 1941; 1942; 1944; 1946; 1947 (2 different copies); 1950 (2 different copies); 1952; 1953
Publisher varies: Tourist Bureau, Tourist Branch, Bureau of Information, Tourist Information Office, Saskatchewan Motor Club
Some are called Tourist and Highway Map, some are Highway and Railway Map
Panel title: Tourist map: Saskatchewan, Canada: The Playground of the West.
(published by combination of government tourism branch and SMC)
On verso: alphabetical listing of service stations, garages and automobile dealers; Summer resorts; Tourist camps.
1947-1953 Panel title: Saskatchewan Tourist Map. (published by Tourist Branch, Bureau of Publications, but not SMC)
on verso: pictorial map of Saskatchewan, mileage tables
Highways are distinguished as "bituminous surfaced" or "gravelled surface", "standard earth grade", "dirt road (unimproved)".
